insert into ad_openscreen (ad_openScreen_id, adv_type_id, player_id, app_id, code_bit_id, request_id, adv_ecpm, clicks, ip, request_time, wx_nick_name, errinfo) values (#{adOpenscreenId}, #{advTypeId}, #{playerId}, #{appId}, #{codeBitId}, #{requestId}, #{advEcpm}, #{clicks}, inet_aton(#{ip}), #{requestTime}, #{wxNickName}, #{errinfo})
select @@identity;
mapper.select: select ad_openScreen_id, adv_type_id, player_id, app_id, code_bit_id, request_id, adv_ecpm, clicks, inet_ntoa(ip) as ip, first_click_time, request_time, wx_nick_name, errinfo from ad_openscreen where adv_type_id = #{advType} order by ad_openScreen_id desc

select open.ad_openScreen_id, open.adv_type_id, open.player_id, open.app_id, open.code_bit_id, open.request_id, open.adv_ecpm, open.clicks, inet_ntoa(ip) as ip, open.first_click_time, open.request_time, open.wx_nick_name, open.errinfo,code.info,code.adn_id,adn.adn_name from yunting_app_test.ad_openscreen open left join behind_manage.admin_codebit code on open.code_bit_id = code.code_bit_id left join behind_manage.adn on code.adn_id = adn.id
where code_bit_id = #{codeId}
